sentence: In March, Florida Governor Ron DeSantis' press secretary Christina Pushaw wrote on Twitter, "The bill that liberals inaccurately call 'Don't Say Gay' would be more accurately described as an Anti-Grooming Bill.
author: Emma Mayer
title: Steven Crowder Tells Teachers Not to Be Groomers During Appreciation Week

author: Taylor Penley
title: Nikole Hannah-Jones, others advocate for critical race theory in wake of Buffalo shooting
